questions.question_text: Bhagwānnu je ek _____ darshan te upar anant koṭi brahmānḍnā je viṣhaysukh chhe te sarvene vārīferīne nākhī deīe ane Bhagwānnā ek rommā jeṭalu sukh rahyu chhe.
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Vachanamrut Sā.1

questions.question_text: Viṣhaynu je sukh chhe te karatā ātmānu sukh bahu adhik chhe ne te karatā Bhagwānnu sukh e to chintāmaṇi chhe.
questions.explanation: The quotation is from Swamini Vato 1/26.

questions.question_text: Karoḍ rūpiyā _____ paṇ āvā Sādhu maḷe nahi ne karoḍ rūpiyā detā paṇ ā vātu maḷe nahi ne karoḍ rūpiyā āpatā paṇ manuṣhya-deh maḷe nahi.
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Swamini Vato 1/19

questions.question_text: Ā dehe Bhagwānne bhajī levā, ne deh to hamaṇā paḍashe, māṭe ā to vījaḷīnā zabakārāmā motī parovī levu, tem thoḍāmā kām kāḍhī levu.
questions.explanation: The quotation is from Swamini Vato 6/77.

questions.question_text: Ā dehe Bhagwānne bhajī levā, ne deh to hamaṇā paḍashe, māṭe ā to vījaḷīnā zabakārāmā _____ _____ levu, tem thoḍāmā kām kāḍhī levu.
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Swamini Vato 6/77

questions.question_text: Bhagwānnu je ek nimiṣhmātranu darshan te upar anant koṭi brahmānḍnā je viṣhaysukh chhe te sarvene vārīferīne nākhī deīe ane Bhagwānnā ek rommā jeṭalu sukh rahyu chhe teṭalu sukh jo anant koṭi brahmānḍnā viṣhaysukh bheḷā karīe to paṇ tenā koṭimā bhāgnī barobar paṇ thāy nahī.
questions.explanation: The quotation is from Vachanamrut Sā.1.

questions.question_text: Viṣhaynu je sukh chhe te karatā ātmānu sukh bahu adhik chhe ne te karatā Bhagwānnu sukh e to _____ chhe.
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Swamini Vato 1/26

questions.question_text: Karoḍ rūpiyā kharachtā paṇ āvā Sādhu maḷe nahi ne karoḍ rūpiyā detā paṇ ā vātu maḷe nahi ne karoḍ rūpiyā āpatā paṇ manuṣhya-deh maḷe nahi; ne āpaṇe paṇ karoḍ janma dharyā chhe, paṇ koī vakhat āvo jog maḷyo nathī. Nīkar shu karavā deh dharavo paḍe?
questions.explanation: The quotation is from Swamini Vato 1/19.
